titleStmt.title: Nissena, an excellent new romance: / written originally in Italian by Francesco Carmeni; and now Englished by an honorable anti-socordist.
titleStmt.author: Carmeni, Francesco.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Humphrey Moseley, and are to be sold at his Shop at the sign of the Princes-Arms in St Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Annotation on Thomason copy: "1st Decemb 1652."; the 3 in the imprint date has been crossed out.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: his Shop at the sign of the Princes-Arms in St Pauls Church-yard
